name: Shining gauntlets
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It decreases the users wisdom a tiny bit.
It decreases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration pathetically.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
